PigLatinGUI - class PigLatinGUI.
Display class to show the PigLatin application as a Java 2 Application.
PigLatinGUI() - Constructor for class PigLatinGUI
Default constructor to setup the window
PigLatinModel - class PigLatinModel.
Class which handles the file I/O and returns the summary of the job.
PigLatinModel() - Constructor for class PigLatinModel
Null constructor which initializes the instance variables.
PigLatinWords - class PigLatinWords.
The PigLatinWords class translates words to PigLatin using the rules: Words that start with a vowel (A,E,I,O,U) simply have "WAY" appended to the end Words that start with a consonant have all consonant letters up to the first vowel moved to the end of the word and AY appended Words that have only Y as a vowel (by, my, try) simply have AY appended to the end All words that can be translated must be at least one letter long and may only contain letters.
PigLatinWords() - Constructor for class PigLatinWords
The null constructor which initializes everything to the default state.

S

setInputFilename(String) - Method in class PigLatinModel
Accepts a non-null file name to be used as the input file name.
setOutputFilename(String) - Method in class PigLatinModel
Accepts a non-null file name to be used as the output file name.
setWord(String) - Method in class PigLatinWords
Set the word to be translated to pig latin.

T

translate() - Method in class PigLatinModel
Method which performs the translation of the input file to the output file.
